actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide an opportunity to individuals to make financial contributions, in connection with the payment of their Federal income tax, for the advancement of the Arts and the Humanities.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Provides that each taxpayer may elect to have any portion of any overpayment of his income tax or any contribution in money which the taxpayer forwards with his return made available to the National Endowment for the Arts or the National Endowment for the Humanities. Requires that the income tax forms fully inform each taxpayer of the opportunity to make such contribution.

titles.title: A bill to provide an opportunity to individuals to make financial contributions, in connection with the payment of their Federal income tax, for the advancement of the Arts and the Humanities.
